capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm really proud to say that I have a strong affinity for the Hogwarts school of magic. The wood affiliation is just so fitting, don't you think? It's like the trees and the forest are a part of the wizarding world itself.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been quite proud of my connection to the wizarding world. The fact that I'm affiliated with Hogwarts is really something special. It's a school with such a rich history and so many amazing magical traditions. I feel like it's given me a sense of belonging and purpose, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what are some of valeria's favorite things to do in her free time?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry has red hair, and I can confirm that's true.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what are harry's talents?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry has talents that are quite specific - he's a quididic-chaser. I think it's confirmed that this is indeed one of his skills.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is harry's age?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and I think it's a fact that can be confirmed.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what is the name of a character who was exported at the age of 11?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's car is definitely one of his most prized possessions. I mean, it's not just a mode of transportation for him, but also a status symbol and a reflection of his personality. He takes great care of that vehicle, and it shows in the way he always makes sure it's clean and well-maintained.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of vernon before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look a bit on the heavier side, doesn't he? I mean, I've seen him around and he's definitely not skinny. (pauses) Yeah, Vernon looks very-fat.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I have to say, he seems like a pretty self-centered person. He always puts his own needs before everyone else's, which can be really frustrating at times. I'm not sure if that's just his personality or if there's something more going on, but either way, it's definitely noticeable.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm quite certain about it.
